title: With Patch 6.11
body: We now have the nerf patch

replies.body: Still no volibear nerf, and they barely tickled zed
More like a buff to Zed :l

Buff to Taliyah
Slight buff to maokai

Changes to Trinity force result in indirect buffs to attack speed champions with spammable abilities  like {{champion:77}}  {{champion:24}}  {{champion:39}}  {{champion:5}}  {{champion:35}}  {{champion:254}} {{champion:78}}  {{champion:203}}
